2. Personas

Table 1: Personas
Name Category Description
Andor Kesselman Existing Basic Andor has a business (LLC) and has a consulting practice. He has some familiarity with starting a company and has been running it for a while, but is generally very basic with his approach. He does not have a lot of time to investigate nuances of financial systems.
